metadata.synopsis: A druid we've saved twice from goblins thanks us after a major attack. This dialogue takes place after the player has successfully fought back an army of goblins that attacked the druid grove.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Repro steps:1. Start the game2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. oe readyattackonden4. speak to zevlor5. killcombat to kill all goblins6. goto -461.924; 0.839; -22.413

0.speaker: Findal
0.text: You're starting to feel like my personal bodyguard. I wish you were.
0.context: NodeContext: with a smile of genuine gratitude
